title: 求一个ChestCommands插件的配置文件
author: wdshiji
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: HuaiYang
replies.txt_content:
@dshiji 
######################
#+                  +#
#   MENU SETTINGS    #
#+                  +#
######################

menu-settings:

  # name - 显示的标题 - 必要的
  name: '&1示例菜单'

  # rows - 菜单行数 - 必要的
  rows: 3

  # command - 可选的 (你可以删除这项或设置为 '')
  command: ''

  # open-with-item - 可选的 (你可以删除
  # 或设置为 0)
  open-with-item:
    item-id: 0
    left-click: false
    right-click: false


######################
#+                  +#
#       ITEMS        #
#+                  +#
######################


spawncmd:
  COMMAND: 'spawn'
  NAME: '&e/spawn'
  LORE:
    - '只是执行 /spawn 指令'
    - '作用于点击此的玩家.'
  ID: 355
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 1


colored-enchanted-stacked-wool:
  NAME: '&a额外配置的羊毛'
  LORE:
    - ''
    - '这个物品项目包含这些节点:'
    - '&fID: 35 &8羊毛ID'
    - '&fDATA-VALUE: 1 &8额外数值 最终显示为橘色羊毛'
    - '&fAMOUNT: 24 &8堆叠数量大小'
    - '&fENCHANTMENT: knockback,10 &8附魔属性'
  ID: 35
  DATA-VALUE: 1
  AMOUNT: 10
  ENCHANTMENT: knockback,10
  POSITION-X: 2
  POSITION-Y: 1


this-text-will-not-appear:
  NAME: '&d代码'
  LORE:
    - '你可以使用所有的代码!如下'
    - '&f颜色: &c#c &a#a &9#9 &e#e &f... ...'
    - '&f随机 (#k): &kfy379!H'
    - '&f加粗 (#l): &lexample'
    - '&f删除线 (#m): &mexample'
    - '&f下划线 (#n): &nexample'
    - '&f斜体 (#o): &oexample'
  ID: 339
  POSITION-X: 3
  POSITION-Y: 1


test-from-console:
  COMMAND: 'console:say 你好 <player>!'
  NAME: '&c以控制台身份执行命令.'
  LORE:
    - '用指令 /say 来广播.'
  ID: 137
  POSITION-X: 4
  POSITION-Y: 1


test-as-op:
  COMMAND: 'op:say 你好 世界!'
  NAME: '&c以OP身份执行命令.'
  LORE:
    - '对这些命令需要小心些.'
  ID: 137
  POSITION-X: 5
  POSITION-Y: 1


test-with-placeholder:
  COMMAND: 'tell:&9在线玩家: &f<online_players>/<max_players>; tell:&9你的名字: &f<player>; tell:&9你所在的世界: &f<world>'
  NAME: '&6发送一条消息显示一些服务器数值'
  LORE:
    - '显示 当这项物品'
    - '被点击.'
  ID: 395
  POSITION-X: 6
  POSITION-Y: 1


economy-and-give:
  COMMAND: 'tell:&aYou have paid 50$ for this command!; give:266'
  NAME: '&e经济 & 出售物品'
  LORE:
    - '这个指令将被执行'
    - '当你有至少 50$!'
    - '执行后将给你一个金锭.'
  ID: 266
  PRICE: 50
  POSITION-X: 7
  POSITION-Y: 1


economy-and-take:
  REQUIRED-ITEM: 266
  COMMAND: 'tell:&aYou have been paid 50$; givemoney:50'
  NAME: '&e经济 & 收购物品'
  LORE:
    - '&c这个指令与先前的相反.'
    - '将拿走你一个金锭并付你 $50.'
  ID: 266
  POSITION-X: 8
  POSITION-Y: 1


will-not-close:
  NAME: '&2Info'
  LORE:
    - '&7点击这个物品时'
    - '&7菜单将不会关闭.'
  ID: 323
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 9
  POSITION-Y: 1


a-talking-head:
  COMMAND: 'tell:这是一个简单的消息, 没有任何指令!'
  NAME: '&3告诉你一些事情,没有任何指令.'
  LORE:
    - '&7这个与1.7版本的 /tellraw 指令相似.'
  ID: 397
  DATA-VALUE: 3
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 2


test-multiple-command:
  COMMAND: 'console:say 你知道吗...; console:say 你可以执行多个指令?;'
  NAME: '&a多数指令'
  LORE:
    - '可使用多个指令.'
  ID: 322
  POSITION-X: 2
  POSITION-Y: 2


permission:
  COMMAND: 'tell:&a[v] 你有了正确的权限!'
  NAME: '&8权限测试'
  LORE:
    - '要使用这个物品,你需要'
    - '这个权限 "chestcommands.test".'
    - '不然一个出错的'
    - '消息将会显示.'
  ID: 101
  POSITION-X: 3
  POSITION-Y: 2
  PERMISSION: chestcommands.test


give-items-yml:
  NAME: '&b给予自定义名称的物品, 介绍, ...'
  ID: 278
  COMMAND: 'giveitem:enchanted-pick'
  LORE:
    - '你需要在文件里先配置物品'
    - 'items.yml,准确的配置好按钮.'
    - '然后添加指令 giveitem:&o物品名字&7'
    - '在一个按钮上. &o物品名字 &7是内设的'
    - '给予物品的名字.'
  POSITION-X: 4
  POSITION-Y: 2


menu-close-no-commands-no-lore:
  NAME: '&6关闭菜单'
  ID: 123
  LORE:
    - '创建一个没有指令的物品,'
    - '菜单蒋会关闭.'
  POSITION-X: 5
  POSITION-Y: 2


return-to-main:
  COMMAND: 'open:main-menu.yml'
  NAME: '&6[arrow_left] 回到主菜单 &7(main-menu.yml)'
  ID: 399
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 9
  POSITION-Y: 3复制代码
######################
#+                  +#
#   MENU SETTINGS    #
#+                  +#
######################


menu-settings:
  name: '&4控制台 管理'
  rows: 3


######################
#+                  +#
#       ITEMS        #
#+                  +#
######################


weather-clear:
  COMMAND: 'weather clear'
  NAME: '&a使天气变为晴.'
  LORE:
    - '/weather clear'
  ID: 351
  DATA-VALUE: 11
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 1


weather-rain:
  COMMAND: 'weather storm'
  NAME: '&a使天气变为下雨.'
  LORE:
    - '/weather storm'
  ID: 351
  DATA-VALUE: 7
  POSITION-X: 2
  POSITION-Y: 1


day:
  COMMAND: 'time set day'
  NAME: '&a设置时间为 day.'
  LORE:
    - '/time set day'
  ID: 347
  POSITION-X: 5
  POSITION-Y: 1


night:
  COMMAND: 'time set night'
  NAME: '&a设置时间为 night.'
  LORE:
    - '/time set night'
  ID: 347
  POSITION-X: 6
  POSITION-Y: 1


diamonds:
  COMMAND: 'give:264,64'
  NAME: '&a给你一组钻石.'
  LORE:
    - 'give:264,64 (这是一个特殊的指令)'
  ID: 264
  AMOUNT: 64
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 2


suicide:
  COMMAND: 'kill'
  NAME: '&c杀死~(自己).'
  LORE:
    - '/kill'
    - ''
    - '如果你有essentials, 可以使用 "kill <player>"'
  ID: 331
  POSITION-X: 5
  POSITION-Y: 2


clear-potion-effects:
  COMMAND: 'effect <player> clear'
  NAME: '&a清除玩家状态影响.'
  LORE:
    - '/effect <player> clear'
  ID: 373
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 3


drugs-are-bad:
  NAME: '&d不要使用药物!, 不要点!'
  COMMAND: 'effect <player> CONFUSION; effect <player> BLINDNESS; effect <player> JUMP 30 2; effect <player> SLOW_DIGGING 30 3'
  LORE:
    - '~这指令写起来太长了.'
  ID: 338
  POSITION-X: 2
  POSITION-Y: 3


list:
  COMMAND: 'list'
  NAME: '&a在线玩家人数.'
  LORE:
    - '/list'
  ID: 397
  DATA-VALUE: 3
  POSITION-X: 5
  POSITION-Y: 3


return-to-main:
  COMMAND: 'open:main-menu.yml'
  NAME: '&6[arrow_left] 回到主菜单'
  ID: 399
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 9
  POSITION-Y: 3复制代码
######################
#+                  +#
#   MENU SETTINGS    #
#+                  +#
######################

menu-settings:

  # name - 显示的标题 - 必要的
  name: '&4Chest Commands'

  # rows - 菜单行数 - 必要的
  rows: 3

  # command - 可选的 (你可以删除这项或设置为 '')
  command: 'menu'

  # open-with-item - 可选的 (你可以删除
  # 或设置为 0)
  # 在这个设置里打开方式将为一本书 (右键)
  open-with-item:
    item-id: 340
    left-click: false
    right-click: true
#   data-value: 0

######################
#+                  +#
#       ITEMS        #
#+                  +#
######################


website:
  COMMAND: 'tell:&7网址: &9dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/chest-commands'
  NAME: '&9[+] 插件网址 [+]'
  LORE:
    - '插件网址链接.'
    - '点击来获得.'
  ID: 327
  POSITION-X: 3
  POSITION-Y: 2


tutorial:
  COMMAND: 'open:plugin-tutorial.yml'
  NAME: '&a[+] 插件教程 [+]'
  LORE:
    - '点击来打开一个菜单'
    - '将教你如何使用'
    - 'ChestCommands.'
  ID: 340
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 4
  POSITION-Y: 2


example:
  COMMAND: 'open:example.yml'
  NAME: '&e[+] 示例菜单 [+]'
  LORE:
    - '一个菜单将如何制作.'
    - '你将看到这个示例'
    - '的每个特征.'
  ID: 54
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 5
  POSITION-Y: 2


admin:
  COMMAND: 'open:admin-console.yml'
  NAME: '&c[+] 控制台管理 [+]'
  LORE:
    - '一个示例来学习'
    - '怎么用这个插件.'
  ID: 137
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 6
  POSITION-Y: 2


shop:
  COMMAND: 'open:simple-shop.yml'
  NAME: '&d[+] 商店 [+]'
  LORE:
    - '你知道吗? 你可以用这个插件'
    - '制作一个菜单商店.'
  ID: 388
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 7
  POSITION-Y: 2复制代码
######################
#+                  +#
#   MENU SETTINGS    #
#+                  +#
######################


menu-settings:
  name: '&1插件教程'
  rows: 1


######################
#+                  +#
#       ITEMS        #
#+                  +#
######################


info:
  COMMAND: ''
  NAME: '&a这个插件能干什么?'
  LORE:
    - '这个插件将允许你制作'
    - '&e界面&7 来给你的用户, 他们将获得'
    - '一个指令列表来执行'
    - '可以不用输入它们'
    - '在键盘上. 如果不包括'
    - '特殊标签, 命令将会'
    - '被 &e执行于玩家上&7,'
    - '一些需要权限来使用的'
    - '命令,可以通过特殊标签执行.'
  ID: 264
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 1


permissions:
  NAME: '&a权限'
  LORE:
    - '给你的玩家权限'
    - '&echestcommands.open.&6&o文本名&e.yml'
    - '让他们用一个菜单'
    - '&6&o文本名称&e.yml'
    - '让他们使用配置的'
    - '物品来打开菜单.'
    - '当然, 必须有权限'
    - '如下'
    - '&echestcommands.item.menu.yml'
    - '才能用书来打开菜单.'
  ID: 101
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 2
  POSITION-Y: 1


about-menus:
  NAME: '&a关于菜单'
  LORE:
    - 'ChestCommands 允许你制作'
    - '核心菜单. 每个都有自己'
    - '的配置, 和权限.'
    - '在文件夹内打开一个菜单文件'
    - '&eplugins/ChestCommands/menu/'
    - '看看他将如何显示. 你将会看到'
    - '2 个部分: 菜单设置和物品.'
    - '不要删除 "name" 或 "rows" 因为'
    - '他们是必须的.你可以删除'
    - '"command" 并且 "open-with-item".'
  ID: 389
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 3
  POSITION-Y: 1


items:
  NAME: '&a关于唯一的物品'
  LORE:
    - 'An item is an icon of the menu, that can be clicked'
    - 'to execute one or more commands. There are multiple'
    - 'items in each menu, and each item contains some nodes.'
    - 'Example:'
    - ''
    - '&6spawncmd:           &8[arrow_left] Internal name, must not be the same of another'
    - '&e  COMMAND: ''spawn''           &7The command to execute without /'
    - '&e  NAME: ''Spawn''                &7The name'
    - '&e  LORE:                          &7The lore of the item'
    - '&e    - ''Warp to the spawn'''
    - '&e    - ''with this magic item'''
    - '&e  PRICE: 100                   &7The price of the command, can be omitted'
    - '&e  ID: 35                         &7The id of the item used'
    - '&e  DATA-VALUE: 3              &7The damage value of the item'
    - '&e  AMOUNT: 10                   &7The size of the stack, can be omitted'
    - '&e  ENCHANTMENT: power,10   &7The enchantment name with the level'
    - '&e  PERMISSION: chc.test       &7Permission required to click the item'
    - '&e  REQUIRED-ITEM: 264,1      &7Required item (for shops) <id>,[amount],[data]'
    - '&e  POSITION-X: 1               &7The position from the left side (1-9)'
    - '&e  POSITION-Y: 1               &7The position from the top side (1-[N. of rows])'
  ID: 267
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 4
  POSITION-Y: 1


commands:
  NAME: '&aAbout commands'
  LORE:
    - 'There are many types of commands:'
    - '&e- COMMAND: ''''&f = no command will be executed'
    - '&e- COMMAND: ''spawn''&f = executed as the player'
    - '&e- COMMAND: ''spawn;me teleported''&f = multiple commands'
    - '&e- COMMAND: ''console:say Hello''&f = executed as console'
    - '&e- COMMAND: ''op:say Hello!''&f = executed as OP'
    - '&e- COMMAND: ''open:example.yml''&f = to open another menu'
    - '&e- COMMAND: ''tell:Hello <player>!''&f = customizable message'
    - '&e- COMMAND: ''broadcast:Broadcasting!''&f = broadcast a message'
    - '&e- COMMAND: ''give:264,1,0''&f = Give items. give:<id>,[amount],[data]'
    - '&e- COMMAND: ''giveitem:example''&f = Give a configured item in items.yml'
    - ''
    - '&o&7You can use symbols (<3, [*], [v], [cross] ...) in "tell" and "broadcast".'
  ID: 137
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 5
  POSITION-Y: 1


symbols:
  NAME: '&a符号'
  LORE:
    - '你可以使用以下字符在'
    - 'NAME, LORE, "tell:" 和 "broadcast:"'
    - '指令, 如下:'
    - ''
    - '&e<&e3 &f= <3'
    - '&e[&e*] &f= [*]'
    - '&e[&e**] &f= [**]'
    - '&e[&e+] &f= [+]'
    - '&e[&e++] &f= [++]'
    - '&e[&ep] &f= [p]'
    - '&e[&ev] &f= [v]'
    - '&e[&ecross] &f= [cross]'
    - '&e[&ex] &f= [x]'
    - '&e[&e/] &f= [/]'
    - '&e[&earrow_right] &f = [arrow_right]'
    - '&e[&earrow_up] &f = [arrow_up]'
    - '&e[&earrow_down] &f = [arrow_down]'
    - '&e[&earrow_left] &f = [arrow_left]'
  ID: 323
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 6
  POSITION-Y: 1


return-to-main:
  COMMAND: 'open:main-menu.yml'
  NAME: '&6[arrow_left] 回到主菜单'
  ID: 399
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 9
  POSITION-Y: 1复制代码
######################
#+                  +#
#   MENU SETTINGS    #
#+                  +#
######################


menu-settings:
  name: '&5商店'
  rows: 6

#+                  +#

buy-cake:

buy-apple:

buy-helmet:
  PRICE: 50

buy-chest:
  PRICE: 80
  COMMAND: 'give:307'
  NAME: '&aBuy'

    - 'Iron Chestplate x1'

buy-leg:
  PRICE: 70
  COMMAND: 'give:308'
  NAME: '&aBuy'
  LORE:
    - 'Iron Leggings x1'
    - 'at $70'

  POSITION-X: 8
  POSITION-Y: 1


buy-boots:
  PRICE: 40
  COMMAND: 'give:309'
  NAME: '&aBuy'
  LORE:
    - 'Iron Boots x1'
    - 'at $40'

  POSITION-Y: 1


buy-sword:
  PRICE: 200
  COMMAND: 'give:276'
  NAME: '&aBuy'
  LORE:
    - 'Diamond Sword x1'
    - 'at $200'
  ID: 267
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 7
  POSITION-Y: 2


buy-bow:
  PRICE: 20
  COMMAND: 'give:261'
  NAME: '&aBuy'
  LORE:
    - 'Bow x1'
    - 'at $20'
  ID: 261
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 8
  POSITION-Y: 2


buy-arrows:
  PRICE: 50
  COMMAND: 'give:262,10'
  NAME: '&aBuy'
  LORE:
    - 'Arrows x10'
    - 'at $50'
  ID: 262

  KEEP-OPEN: true

  POSITION-Y: 2


sell-cobble:
  REQUIRED-ITEM: 4,64
  COMMAND: 'givemoney:10'
  NAME: '&dSell'
  LORE:
    - 'Cobblestone x64'
    - 'at $10'
  ID: 4
